name: Athul P M
about: I am currently pursuing a bachelors degree in Metallurgical & Materials Engineering from IIT Kharagpur. I am a result driven individual with a passion for creating innovative solutions. I have a background in product strategy and market analysis. I am always seeking new challenges and opportunities to continue honing my skills. Connect with me to learn more about my experience and interests.

positions.subtitle: Students'​ Alumni Cell, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: Working under the Dean of Outreach, Team Students'​ Alumni Cell strives to establish and nurture the interaction between the Institute and the alumni. It has served as a platform facilitating communication between the current students of IIT Kharagpur and their predecessors. The team works on facets like Networking, Sponsorship, Publications and Events with an objective to keep the alumni connected to their Alma Mater and updated about the latest happenings in the Institute. We organize events like the Annual Alumni Meet (Reunion), Homecoming, Regional Student-Alumni Meet, Leadership Summit, and Alumni Talks and carry on programmes like the Alumni-Student Mentorship to meet our objective.

experience.title: Member OGV
experience.description: AIESEC is a global platform for young people to develop their leadership potential through international internships and volunteer opportunities. Founded in 1948, AIESEC is a non-governmental, and not-for-profit organization entirely run by youth for youth.

publications: [{"title":"Yearnings of Yore","subtitle":"Office of Alumni Affairs and Branding, IIT Kharagpur","date":"March 10, 2022","description":"Yearnings of Yore is a magical treasury of memoirs and photographs, which provides us with an insight into the lives of the alumni at IIT Kharagpur. It’s aimed to create a sense of nostalgia amongst the alumni community who relive their beautiful memories through literary pieces related to their time at the institute. This magazine is a souvenir for the alumni who attend the Annual Alumni Meet to relive the nostalgia of their time at KGP."}]

honors_and_awards.title: 46th KVS National Sports Meet U-19 Team Bronze (Chess)
honors_and_awards.description: Was a part of the team that secured Third position in 46th KVS National Sports Meet in the Under 19 Category (Chess), which was an event in which over 1200 Kendriya Vidyalayas participated from all over the country

honors_and_awards.title: KVS Ernakulam Region Regional Level Sports Meet 2015-2016 U-19 Bronze (Chess)
honors_and_awards.description: Secured Third Position in U-19 Catagory (Chess), a competition in which all the Kendriya Vidyalayas of Kerala participated and received the chance to be a part of the team representing the region in the 46th KVS National Sports Meet
